system.summary: Prepare a vehicle to endure wear or hostile conditions.

description.value:
As a Long Rest Action, you can tune up a vehicle to give one of the following benefits. Should the vehicle take any damage, be used to travel for a cumulative full day, or travel over rough terrain for half the length, the benefit is removed.

  • Lubricate: Increase movement speed of vehicle by ¼ rounded up to the nearest 5 feet. In addition, reduce travel time by 1 day per 6 days of travel.
  • Reinforce: Increase the vehicle’s durability. Make an Intelligence (Craft) check, giving the vehicle temporary hit points equal to the result.
  • Weather Proof: Increase the vehicle’s resilience to one type of intense weather. Vehicles can add your Intelligence (Craft) modifier to checks relating to the vehicle avoiding the detriments of the weather.
  • Terrain Match: Prepare a vehicle for particularly intense weather, so long as you have fitting parts. Vehicles can add your Intelligence (Craft) modifier to checks relating to the vehicle traveling across rough terrain.
